title: BattleBit Stole Battlefield's Audience by Just Being "Battlefield" | Design Delve
description:
Join our Patreon for a week of Early Access to all of our Premium video series including Zero Punctuation, Cold Take, Extra Punctuation, Adventure is Nigh and more! Just $2/month with a 7 day free trial. ►► https://www.patreon.com/the_escapist

In today's episode of Design Delve JM8 delves into what has caused the Battlefield franchise to fall so low and how Battlebit swept in to pick up where it left off.

If you want to see more game design content a new Design Delve episode will release every other week, or you can subscribe to JM8s personal channel for similar content: https://www.youtube.com/@designdelve
